original_text: Now therefore, kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman who has known man by lying with him.
korean_text: 그러므로 아이들 중에서 남자는 다 죽이고 남자와 동침하여 사내를 아는 여자도 다 죽이고

sentences.original_text: kill every male among the little ones,
sentences.korean_translation: 어린 아이들 중 모든 남자를 죽이고,

sentences.original_text: who has known man by lying with him.
